en.title: Hobbies & Interests
en.description: This is pretty much how I spend my free time:

en.title: Family & Friends
en.description: Time spent with cherished loved ones, creating lifelong memories.

de.title: Familie und Freunde
de.description: Zeit mit Familie und Freunden verbringen.

en.title: Relaxing
en.description: Indulging in tranquility, unwinding the stresses of life.

de.title: Entspannung
de.description: Disfrutando de la tranquilidad, deshaciendo el estrés de la vida.

en.title: Movies and Shows
en.description: Watching and finding out about scineastic masterpieces.

de.title: Filme und Serien
de.description: Anschauen und recherchieren über scineastische Meisterwerke.

en.title: Exercise
en.description: Dedicating time to physical well-being, nurturing a healthy lifestyle.

de.title: Training
de.description: Fitnessstudio und andere sportliche Aktivitäten wie Badminton und Wandern.

en.title: Cooking and Baking
en.description: Cooking and baking local and international dishes

de.title: Kochen und Backen
de.description: Kochen und Backen nationaler und internationaler Gerichte.

en.title: Programming
en.description: Exploring code, algorithms, and building software solutions for real-world challenges.

de.title: Programmieren
de.description: Explorar código, algoritmos y desarrollar soluciones de software para desafíos del mundo real.

en.title: Music
en.description: Playing guitar, making music with Friends, and listening to music.

de.title: Musik
de.description: Gitarre spielen, mit Freunden Musik machen und Musik hören.

en.title: Visual Arts
en.description: Exploring visual aesthetics, graphic design, and expressing ideas through artistic creativity.

de.title: Artes Visuales
de.description: Explorar la estética visual, el diseño gráfico y expresar ideas a través de la creatividad artística.
